articles.description: PUBG Mobile Update: PUBG Mobile is expected to relaunch the battle royale game in India as PUBG Mobile India later this year. But when? We explain.
articles.content: PUBG Mobile was banned by the Indian government in September last year alongside hundreds of other Chinese applications. The app was blocked by Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology (Mei… [+3313 chars]

articles.title: WhatsApp May Soon Allow Public Testing of Multi-Device Support for Android Users - Gadgets 360
